title: The Giver
overview: After the sudden death of their parents, siblings Tailah and Fahrung's lives are turned upside down. Struggling to get by, Tailah gets involved with Hiran, the son of a powerful businessman who uses his money and power to elevate himself above what is just. When Tailah finds himself faced with a monsoon of iniquity, his only reason to keep smiling is Akat. Akat, like Tailah, loathes injustice in its many forms.
